snippet.textDisplay:
who cares.

Who cares? It's the FA cup. Nice … but the Champions and League titles are more important. And POOL is now 1 silver behind ManU … with Arsenal about 5 silvers behind Pool for 3rd place.

And Pool is the #1 winner of the Champions title from the ENGLISH division.

For the FA, we are tied for 4th place with the most silvers.

snippet.textDisplay: I'm super annoyed pple. I'm after trophies and winning everything that's in front of us. To bow out looking toothless is just bad. I don't think it's forbidden to play good attacking football. Now, if you tell me that we look good for money to get thru Atletico, that would be insane.  It all kind looks like Klopp is experiencing this type situation for the first time bcz the changes (or lack of) is just off.  I've heard it said we can't keep up Style of play for an entire season. I think that's looking very true right now!!  Summer better be good shopping for new players if we want to defend that EP title!
snippet.textOriginal: I'm super annoyed pple. I'm after trophies and winning everything that's in front of us. To bow out looking toothless is just bad. snippet.textDisplay:
Happens to all great teams at one time or another. Seemingly invincible, then a couple of very close wins, then a loss, then another.
The psychology of losing when you have been so dominant for so long, its quite unhinging to feel like your untouchable magic has been touched.
snippet.textOriginal:
Happens to all great teams at one time or another. Seemingly invincible, then a couple of very close wins, then a loss, then another. 
The psychology of losing when you have been so  dominant for so long, its quite unhinging to feel like your untouchable magic has been touched.

snippet.textDisplay: We were much improved in the first half.  Second half we were poor.  We're in a bad run of form and we need to now get over the line by wrapping up another 12 points. snippet.textDisplay: I wonder if Klopp was hoping to lose the game. He was so late with the subs. The midfield without the captain has been horrible. The defense is giving gifts to opponents. And why are we resting Allison. Klopp really wanted to lose and get out of this competition, but why bring Salah and Fermino? May be to make it look like he was trying?
snippet.textOriginal: I wonder if Klopp was hoping to lose the game. He was so late with the subs. The midfield without the captain has been horrible. The defense is giving gifts to opponents. snippet.textDisplay: Can't be too critical of the team this season but we seem to be a little too comfortable of late in terms of how we're playing. Too many people are quick to slate the likes of Origi, Fabinho, Lovren and even Henderson in the past but dare anyone slate the likes of VVD, TAA, Robertson or the front three who have all been below parr in recent months. Every team is intitled to have a bad patch but the players need to react now. We need a big reaction starting against Bournemouth on Saturday. Need to treat every game like a cup final now. Need to dust themselves down finish strong. Every player needs to raise their game. Need to fight like lions now and the big prize will be in our hands. YNWA
snippet.textOriginal: Can't be too critical of the team this season but we seem to be a little too comfortable of late in terms of how we're playing. Too many people are quick to slate the likes of Origi, Fabinho, Lovren and even Henderson in the past but dare anyone slate the likes of VVD, TAA, Robertson or the front three who have all been below parr in recent months. Every team is intitled to have a bad patch but the players need to react now. We need a big reaction starting against Bournemouth on Saturday. Need to treat every game like a cup final now. Need to dust themselves down finish strong. Every player needs to raise their game. Need to fight like lions now and the big prize will be in our hands. YNWA

snippet.textDisplay: WOULD NOT HAVE MADE ANY DIFFERENCE. LIVERPOOLS ONE DIMENSIONAL STYLE OF PLAY FINALLY HAS COUGHT UP WITH THEM. ALL WE DO IS MOVE THE BALL QUICKLY FROM ONE WING TO ANOTHER FOR THE CROSS, AND IF WE CAN'T GET THAT WE LOOK FOR THE BALL OVER THE TOP. REGARDLESS OF THE TEAM SHEET ITS THE SAME STYLE OF PLAY. WELL ITS NOT WORKING ANYMORE. TEAMS NOW KNOW HOW TO DEFEND AGAINST THEM. Klopp does not have a plan B. Theres no attack or creativity down the middle. That ridiculously high line only pushes our front line so high that they have no space to play. Its like we are pressing our own players. They can talk about who is missing but THIS LIVERPOOL WAS NOT A ONE OR TWO MAN TEAM. it was a squad that played a certain way. That way has now become very defendable. Other teams have learned and improved and blocked off the wings and play deep so theres no ball over the top. .. Liverpool don't have anymore tricks in the bag.   GET RID OF THAT ARROGANT HIGH LINE. ITS SELF DEFEATING!
snippet.textOriginal: WOULD NOT HAVE MADE ANY DIFFERENCE. LIVERPOOLS ONE DIMENSIONAL STYLE OF PLAY FINALLY HAS COUGHT UP WITH THEM. ALL WE DO IS MOVE THE BALL QUICKLY FROM ONE WING TO ANOTHER FOR THE CROSS, AND IF WE CAN'T GET THAT WE LOOK FOR THE BALL OVER THE TOP. REGARDLESS OF THE TEAM SHEET ITS THE SAME STYLE OF PLAY. WELL ITS NOT WORKING ANYMORE. TEAMS NOW KNOW HOW TO DEFEND AGAINST THEM. Klopp does not have a plan B. Theres no attack or creativity down the middle. That ridiculously high line only pushes our front line so high that they have no space to play. Its like we are pressing our own players. They can talk about who is missing but THIS LIVERPOOL WAS NOT A ONE OR TWO MAN TEAM. it was a squad that played a certain way. That way has now become very defendable. Other teams have learned and improved and blocked off the wings and play deep so theres no ball over the top. .. Liverpool don't have anymore tricks in the bag.   GET RID OF THAT ARROGANT HIGH LINE. ITS SELF DEFEATING!

snippet.textDisplay:
It's over .....No point talking about it...... There is still lots of football to play.... We go again.... Let's get behind the team... Any team will go through a bad patch.....


Walk on through the wind
Walk on through the rain
Though your dreams be tossed and blown
Walk on, walk on
With hope in your heart
And you'll never walk alone.....

snippet.textDisplay: “Champions of the world” more like “championship of the world” 😂😂😂😂 2-0!!!!!!!!!!!!
snippet.textOriginal: “Champions of the world” more like “championship of the world” 😂😂😂😂 2-0!!!!!!!!!!!!

snippet.textDisplay: Our overall performance as of late has been poor, ever since the wolves game the play has been sloppy. Of course we will win the league and that was our goal so I'm not going to panic. Once again our midfield is our weakness , there is no creativity and link from defensive to attack. The ball just goes out wide as soon as possible. People say Chelsea played well but we gifted them their goals. Playing out from the back , high defensive line these are the risks we take and we got punished. If we go out of Europe our season is effectively done and I'll think of it as a successful season but I think the disappointing thing is that we were on the edge of greatness and fell short.
snippet.textOriginal: Our overall performance as of late has been poor, ever since the wolves game the play has been sloppy. Of course we will win the league and that was our goal so I'm not going to panic. Once again our midfield is our weakness , there is no creativity and link from defensive to attack. The ball just goes out wide as soon as possible. People say Chelsea played well but we gifted them their goals. Playing out from the back , high defensive line these are the risks we take and we got punished. If we go out of Europe our season is effectively done and I'll think of it as a successful season but I think the disappointing thing is that we were on the edge of greatness and fell short.

snippet.textDisplay: Feels a bit strange saying this after waiting so long for the league title (assuming no massive collapse) but if we go out of the CL next week, it will feel like a bit of an anti climactic run in to the end of the season. Anyone else think the same?

snippet.textDisplay: It is pretty transparent that opponents are seeing our weakness. Our one dimensional attacking style by only use full back to cross should stop. It doesn’t work anymore. We lack creative playmaker no.10 to supply decisive passes. Mentally, we are weak now. Even if Henderson return there are already signs. I’m okay with us winning the league but performances like these, you never know. Winning convincingly can only heal the scars and get back on track.

snippet.textDisplay: Chelsea absolutely outplayed you, you didn’t throw it away, u weren’t in with a chance, Young Billy absolutely trashes your midfield lol here’s the reality, u can’t play game after game pressing and pressing without running out of steam, last 10 games now and as we have all seen over the years weird shit happens! Remember Newcastle, yourself a last year, city paid the price this season in the league, running out of steam from the previous season, next season cus of the euros if it goes ahead cus of CV there’s no way you will be anywhere near it. League has been poor, u got 4 of the top six rebuilding Or new managers and a city side that’s knackered, won’t be like that next year! You haven’t really looked as good as last season but had the gas to keep going, look like your running out of that when other teams r coming in form, can you really be sure the league is won! If I was a city fan I’d put a few quid on them, cus like I said we r at the stage when weird shit happens, 3 loses in a row should be having u all spooked ya fuck ! Invincible challenge gone, treble gone, what’s going next? CL?

snippet.textDisplay:
Passing was as shocking as the Watford game. Midfield none existent like the Watford game, 18 year old bossed it first half. Second ball lost all the time, Minamino run around without any productivity at all, totally out fought in middle of the park, no rhythm or structure, they wanted it more, and that hurts. Williams only positive out of the game. Let's face facts Klopp has knocked us out of this cup again with the unnecessary resting of players. Just like previous seasons. They were there for the taking last night, simple as that, but we need to rest players that have just had a two weeks off and a week on holiday and the league won already, What a joke. As for our lack of creativity in midfield, we have just let two rivals buy two outstanding midfielders that have everything we need without showing an interest in them.
No doubt some will say shut up look at the league table, and yes made up obviously, but it's just not right to go out the cup under the circumstances ment if you think it is then so be it but I was going the games when we last won league titles and cups and it would not have happened then I'll tell you that.
Different times? Bollocks.
And the winter break has done us no favours at all. Holidays in February, lol nonsense.

snippet.textDisplay: As a Liverpool fan I can see Man City winning this league and I kind of think Klopp has to take the blame for it, if it does happen. What has Klopp had the team doing during the winter break - we don't look like scoring a goal and we don't look like keeping a clean sheet. I'd be amazed if we qualify for the next round of the Champions League and I almost think that it would be a better result than Barca last season. I will say I think we have massively over-achieved the last 2 seasons and perhaps it's starting to show. I also think Klopp should have put a full strength team out tonight just because we need a win!!!!

snippet.textDisplay:
Been coming this form tbh. Our team ran out of ideas against Atletico and since Hendo's been out the side we've been lacking penetration from wide, his link-up play and covering for Trent is vital.
Very poor defending tonight, Lallana wasn't covering for Enako Williams like Hendo does for Trent. Fabinho keeps making really bad mistakes and has offered little since returning from injury. Robertson has been more defensive most of the season because of the Trent partnership with Hendo. You could see he was trying to get forward more this game but It wasn't working.

Really need to get our act together and find something that works. I'm not a fan of these quick 1 two give and go link-up play in midfield. We're not getting into dangerous areas fast enough and are giving ourselves no opportunities to counter-press as well as getting caught badly on the counter.
We need to pepper these boxes, let Mane and Firmino hunt them down. Get balls out wide fast from counter-pressing and whip balls in for the forwards or late runners. We need covering midfielders and we need the work rate of Stallions.

We just need to somehow get past Atletico but I'm fearing the worst.
Whatever happens, I'm going mental when we lift that premier league trophy.
Watching Liverpool has literally helped me through such hard times recently. I'll back these boys through anything.
snippet.textOriginal:

Robertson has been more defensive most of the season because of the Trent partnership with Hendo. You could see he was trying to get forward more this game but It wasn't working.

Really need to get our act together and find something that works. I'm not a fan of these quick 1 two give and go link-up play in midfield. We're not getting into dangerous areas fast enough and are giving ourselves no opportunities to counter-press as well as getting caught badly on the counter.
We need to pepper these boxes, let Mane and Firmino hunt them down. Get balls out wide fast from counter-pressing and whip balls in for the forwards or late runners. We need covering midfielders and we need the work rate of Stallions.

Watching Liverpool has literally helped me through such hard times recently. I'll back these boys through anything.

snippet.textDisplay: Sometimes I think taking a long break in the middle of a good ru when everything is working well is detrimental.  Takes a while again to find the rhythm especially when you've also got players returning from injury trying to find form.

snippet.textDisplay: The chance to be invincibles gone, Arsenal fans loved that. Tonight the FA Cup and chance to do the treble gone, United fans were loving that. I just want us to win everything :(

snippet.textDisplay: We’ve had a dip after a year it was always gonna happen. We are missing Henderson big time and we’ve been missing Milner too so was good to see him back at least. We’ve lost 4 games all season I’m not counting that villa game cause it was the kids that played! No need to be negative this team is more than capable of going on and winning the champions league again. Better to have the wobbles out of the way before Athletico

snippet.textDisplay: You will never win Chelsea following a defeat of 3-nil from Watford playing subs. And I seriously couldn’t see a damn reason to make late changes bringing firmino and Milner.then Salah in last 10 minutes. This is not management. This is arrogance. Klopp ain’t interested in this Cup. Unfortunately the winning mentality is suffering and any results but a win against Bournemouth will have dire effect on Ateletico’s game.
snippet.textOriginal: You will never win Chelsea following a defeat of 3-nil from Watford playing subs. And I seriously couldn’t see a damn reason to make late changes bringing firmino and Milner.then Salah in last 10 minutes. This is not management. This is arrogance. Klopp ain’t interested in this Cup. Unfortunately the winning mentality is suffering and any results but a win against Bournemouth will have dire effect on Ateletico’s game.

snippet.textDisplay:
2 Mistakes before a ball was kicked:
1) Alisson should have started didn't need resting and much less likely to concede
2) Trent I'm sure needed rest, but at least should have been in the SQUAD, the one player that could have created something in the second half.


Underlying problem is that Trent is our only consistent creative outlet, there is none in the midfield so without Trent we look toothless in attack.
snippet.textOriginal:
2 Mistakes before a ball was kicked: 
1) Alisson should have started didn't need resting and much less likely to concede 
2) Trent I'm sure needed rest, but at least should have been in the SQUAD, the one player that could have created something in the second half.


Underlying problem is that Trent is our only consistent creative outlet, there is none in the midfield so without Trent we look toothless in attack.

snippet.textDisplay: Seems like an easy save for Adrian but that was a nasty knuckle shot (and you know these are unpredictable when you try to catch them) at an awkward height for a punch and he sees it a little late because Gomez is in front; probably should have saved it but it wasn't as easy as people make it seem.
snippet.textOriginal: Seems like an easy save for Adrian but that was a nasty knuckle shot (and you know these are unpredictable when you try to catch them) at an awkward height for a punch and he sees it a little late because Gomez is in front; probably should have saved it but it wasn't as easy as people make it seem.

snippet.textDisplay: Concede every game and can't find the back of the net. Pretty alarming set of circumstances at the moment. Need to turn things round and fast!

snippet.textDisplay: Our failure to get Keita, Ox, Minamino, Shaq, H. Elliott, C. Jones any kind of consistent playing time and rhythm is what's killing us. The team is looking for some kind of spark and  it should be one of these players. Liverpool doesn't really have a breakout player this year that you can say has come on and really done bits. I didn't like letting Brewster go on loan.
snippet.textOriginal: Our failure to get Keita, Ox, Minamino, Shaq, H. Elliott, C. Jones any kind of consistent playing time and rhythm is what's killing us. The team is looking for some kind of spark and  it should be one of these players. Liverpool doesn't really have a breakout player this year that you can say has come on and really done bits. I didn't like letting Brewster go on loan.

snippet.textDisplay: I'm not a Liverpool fan so maybe I'm wrong. However, I find this disappointing because this side is so clearly better than just winning the league. Maybe that's fine for you guys? From an outside perspective you've basically got the league tied up so why rest players for this? Doesn't make sense to me.
